meanings.definition: One of two or more joint owners of a property.
meanings.sent1: My sister and I are coproprietors of the family house.
meanings.sent2: The coproprietor of the store decided to sell his share.
meanings.sent3: The coproprietor of the beach house always forgets to bring sunscreen.
meanings.sent4: As coproprietors of the antique shop, they had to make joint decisions.
meanings.sent5: The coproprietor of the farm had a key role in managing the livestock.

meanings.definition: A person who shares ownership of something with others.
meanings.sent1: The coproprietor of the company was responsible for financial matters.
meanings.sent2: She became a coproprietor of the art gallery after investing in it.
meanings.sent3: The coproprietor of the car wash always had the cleanest vehicle.
meanings.sent4: Being a coproprietor of the restaurant felt like being part of a big family.
meanings.sent5: The coproprietor of the bookstore loved recommending new reads to customers.
